item.title: CI (continuous integration)
item.description: The rktpi as an end user product is heavily integrated into the CI system this is only a first step to keep things simple. beta testers and developers should share an environment as much as possible the end user will configure a GH repo for their Raspberry Pi, and they will run our GH Actions to bring their Pi into a working state for their own configuration.
